articles.description: Robert Lewandowski was the unanimous pick for FIFA's top prize and Thierry Henry was full of compliments to the Polish international for finishing 'in front of the two monsters'.
articles.content: Robert Lewandowski told Thierry Henry it feels 'something special' to be crowned FIFA's Best Men's Player for 2020 in the era of Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi following a surprise video call fro… [+3542 chars]

articles.title: Mike Ashley makes takeover powerplay he hopes will help sell Newcastle United in 2021 - Chronicle Live
articles.description: Mike Ashley is still hoping to sell to Saudi Arabia-based Public Investment Fund next year
articles.content:
Mike Ashley is believed to have sent a clear message to Newcastle United's would-be buyers ahead of 2021 following this week's end-of-year Premier League meeting between shareholders.
